name: Shoulders_t-press
step1:
1. Lie on your belly with your legs fully extended and your arms forming a T
shape with your body.

name: Shoulders_side-plank
step1:
1. Start in a side plank position, with your right shoulder over your elbow, your
body in a straight line and reach your left hand toward the ceiling.

name: Shoulders_plank-straight-arm-kickback
step1:
1. Grab a set of dumbbells and get into plank position, with your wrists under
your shoulders and your feet hip-width apart.

name: Shoulders_inchworm
step1: 1. Stand straight with your feet shoulder-width apart.

name: Shoulders_bear-squats
step1:
1. Get down on your hands and knees, with your wrists under your shoulders
and your knees hip-width apart.

name: Legs_walking-lunges
step1:
1. Stand with your feet hip-width apart, take a step forward with your right
foot and then slowly bend both knees until your back knee is just above the
floor.

name: Legs_touch-and-hop
step1: 1. Stand on your right leg with your knee slightly bent.

name: Legs_side-lunge
step1: 1. Stand tall with your feet hip-width apart.

name: Legs_lunge-back-kick
step1:
1. Start with your feet hip-width apart, take a step to the front with your right
leg, and lunge.

name: Legs_jump-start
step1:
1. Stand on your left leg, bend your knee, extend your right leg back, and touch
your left foot with your right hand.

name: Legs_in-and-out-jacks
step1: 1. Stand straight with your feet together and hands by your sides.

name: Legs_heisman
step1: 1. Stand tall with your feet hip width apart and with your knees slightly bent.

name: Legs_flutter-kick-squats
step1:
1. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and with one foot forward and
the other foot behind you.

name: Legs_dumbbell-swing
step1:
1. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, your toes pointed slightly
outward, and hold a dumbbell with both hands.

name: Glutes_side-legs-lifts
step1: 1. Lie on your side with your legs fully extended and stacked.

name: Glutes_rolling-squat
step1: 1. Stand up at the front of the mat with your feet shoulder-width apart.

name: Glutes_plie-squat-scoop-up
step1:
1. Stand with your feet in a wide stance, your toes pointing out to the sides,
and hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing up.

name: Glutes_frog-bridge
step1:
1. Lie on your back, bend your arms and knees, press the soles of your feet
together and let your thighs fall open.

name: Glutes_double-pulse-squat-jump
step1:
1. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and the toes pointing slightly
outward.

name: Glutes_diamond-kicks
step1:
1. Lie on your back with your arms by your sides, raise the legs toward the
ceiling, bend the knees and bring the soles of your feet together (like a frog).

name: Chest_dumbbell-pullover-leg
step1: 1. Lie on your back with your knees bent and hold a dumbbell with both hands.

name: Chest_chest-press-with-less-extended
step1:
1. Lie on your back, holding a dumbbell in each hand, and raise your legs to a
45 degree angle.

name: Chest_chest-fly-bridge
step1:
1. Lie on your back with your knees bent and your arms out to the sides,
holding a dumbbell in each hand.

name: Chest_alternating-medicine-ball-push-up
step1:
1. Start in a push up position with your legs extended back, the hands below
the shoulders and a medicine ball under your left hand.

name: Back_plank-hip-dips
step1:
1. Start in a low plank position with your body in a straight line, your elbows
bent and under your shoulders and your feet hip-width apart.

name: Back_dumbbell-bent-over-row
step1:
1. Grab a set of dumbbells, bend your torso forward and keep your knees
slightly bent.

name: Back_deadlift-upright-row
step1:
1. Stand up with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a set of dumbbells in
front of your thighs.

name: Back_crab-toe-touch
step1:
1. Sit on the mat with your knees bent, feet together and place your hands
behind you.

name: Back_cobra-lat-pulldown
step1: 1. Lie on your stomach with your legs and your arms fully extended.

name: Arms_triceps-dips
step1: 1. Place your hands behind you onto a chair, so that your fingers face forward.

name: Arms_reverse-plank-leg-raise
step1:
1. Sit on the mat with your legs extended and place your hands behind you
with the fingers facing your body.

name: Arms_push-ups
step1:
1. With your legs extended back, place the hands below the shoulders, slightly
wider than shoulder-width apart.

name: Arms_pike-push-ups
step1:
1. Get down on your hands and feet, with your hands shoulder-width apart,
your legs straight and your hips up.

name: Arms_lying-tricep-extension
step1: 1. Lie on your back with your knees bent and a dumbbell in each hand.

name: Arms_curl
step1:
1. Sit down on a bench holding a dumbbell in your left hand, and rest your
elbow on the inside of your left thigh.

name: Abs_v-sit-bicycles
step1: 1. Lie down with your legs slightly bent.

name: Abs_seated-knee-tucks
step1: 1. Sit down with your hands on the mat, your legs fully extended and lean back.

name: Abs_scissor-kicks
step1: 1. Lie on your back with your hands by your sides or place them underneath your glutes.

name: Abs_reverse-crunches
step1:
1. Lie on your back with your hands by your sides.
Lift your knees until your thighs and calves form a
90-degree angle and your calves are parallel to the
floor.

name: Abs_plank-bird-dog
step1:
1. Start in a plank position with your body in a
straight line, your wrists under your shoulders and
your feet shoulder-width apart.

name: Abs_mountain-climbers
step1:
1. Start with your body in a straight line and your
hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Keep your toes and balls of the feet touching the floor.

name: Abs_bent-leg-jackknife
step1:
1. Lie on your back with your legs straight and your
arms extended back.

name: Abs_ankle-tap-pushups
step1:
1. Start in a push up position, with your hands
under your shoulders and your legs extended back

name: Abs_alternate-heel-touchers
step1:
1.Lie on your back, keep your knees bent, arms at
the sides, and keep your back and feet flat on the mat.
